activities: To provide service, Papertrail may collect and retain email addresses, log messages, account usage history, and technical support inquiries. To read a detailed explanation of the information which Papertrail collects and how it is used, or to ask questions, visit Terms of Use on papertrailapp.com.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Web service and log messages as they relate to Papertrail customers. Does not include manually processed.
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
